newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: SIMEX Brent marked higher in line with firm NYMEX.
newsitem.headline: SIMEX Brent marked higher in line with firm NYMEX.

text.p: August Brent futures were untraded at midday on Monday but marked higher in line with a firmer NYMEX crude market on ACCESS, brokers said.
August Brent was quoted at $18.12/$18.27 per barrel, up from London's settlement on Friday at $18.09.
August NYMEX crude added 12 cents on ACCESS to the 11 gained in New York to bring the last trade to $19.45 per barrel.
Brokers said the firmer tone was follow through buying from Friday when generally lacklustre crudes were dragged higher by strong buying of unleaded gasoline futures in New York.
August gasoline ended 0.66 cent higher in New York at 59.26 per gallon, and the price edged a further 0.14 higher on ACCESS, but in extremely thin volume.
